span.title: Article Title: KINDERGARTEN ENROLLMENT - MAKE UP DAY

span.div: Please note the make up day to enroll your child into kindergarten for the 2020-2021 school year that had been scheduled for Tuesday, April 21, 2020, has now been canceled. This is to abide with Governor DeWine's order for school closures through May 1st. A new date has not been decided at this time. Announcements will go out on social media and the school website as soon as a date has been set.
Ohio Crisis Text Line: Text 4hope to 741741
The District will be providing lunches on Mondays and Wednesdays during this extended break:

ul.li: Drive by door #8 behind the building for a “grab and go” bagged lunch: 11:00 am - Noon
Yankee Run Golf Course and Stevenson Heights: 10:30am - 11:00am
Addison Field and Brookfield Acres between: 11:00am - 11:30am
The corner of Syme & Ohio Streets and the corner of Standard and Miller Streets: 11:30am - Noon.

p.span: All school offices (elementary, middle, high, Board) will be staffed Monday, Wednesday, and Friday from 9:00 a.m. until 11:00 a.m. Principals and Board office will be available during these days and times to answer any questions.
*As of this week (March 23rd), the lunch distribution schedule will remain the same.
